alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 27 at 7:39PM CST until February 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Edinburg. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Sunday the stage was 20.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is falling and is expected to be below flood stage just after midnight tonight. The river will continue to fall to 17.9 feet by Friday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 20.1 Sun 6 pm CST 19.8 19.7 19.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 945 AM CST.
